messages.title: I AM READY
messages.content: I am honoured to be standing as The Brexit Party Parliamentary candidate for Ipswich. An educator, I believe that trust in our democracy is under threat. In 2016, 58.3% of our area voted to leave the EU. But more than three years on we still haven't left, and it's not just Brexit. For too many years, the political class has taken our support for granted. Our town needs to increase police numbers and support services to safeguard everyone within the community. As your MP I would make sure that Ipswich gets the investment it deserves. Vote for me to change Politics for Good.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We must control our laws, borders, money and defence.
Let's make parliament serve the people.
Keep investing, better management, less waste.
Spend £200bn on transport and jobs in the regions.
We need a fair, firm points-based system.
